The introductory meeting for the parents of the participants in the Citizen Program
29  January,  2024
As part of the launch of the "My Project Initiative" 2024, an introductory meeting was held with the parents of the participants in the Citizen Program, both boys and girls, at the Best Buddies – Qatar headquarters. The meeting was attended by 28 parents.
The "My Project Initiative" focuses on providing workshops and training sessions for the participants of the Citizen Program in five diverse vocational areas, aiming to develop skills for individuals with disabilities and integrate them into the community by supporting small investment projects for program participants and their families.
The purpose of the meeting was also to inform families about the workflow in implementing the initiative and to address their queries and concerns.
